column4: Does anyone know where i could find the FireFox history folder?
there is a hidden folder called .mozilla in your home directory..     open the home folder and click on the View->Show hidden files menu
been my main os since tribe3
you install compizconfig-settings-manager then its in the menu System->Prefs
ill try your way... see what happens.
How do i make the settings i modified be applied??? I change something and it doesn't work.
are you sure you installed full compiz fusion or just old compiz?
i have Gutsy, it came with it. All the other repositories related to compiz are installed.
ok have you set up the 3D drivers?
yes.. The problem is that if i enable a plugin or change some keys, i don't know when or how to apply them.
it happens straight away..... when you enable 3D drivers you should notice the shadows and window effects already without the config
wobble isn't on by default but as soon as GL is set up the shadows appear and windows fade etc
yes i see the shadows and all the default plugins enabled. What i want is to change something, like a key comb for some effect, but don't know how to apply it.
as I say it normally happens as soon as you pick... can you turn the cube on.. there are two rotate cube and cube 3D
lol... well its ok. I am sure that after i restart the settings will be applied. lol and i thought there was no reason at all to restart linux.
lol,  standing on the branch as you saw
